root.name: Super Dangan Ronpa 2: Sayonara Zetsubou Gakuen
root.description: Super Dangan Ronpa 2: Sayonara Zetsubou Gakuen which is also known as Super Dangan Ronpa 2: Farewell Despair Academy is a continuation to the previous video game series Dangan Ronpa: Academy of Hope and High School Students of Despair.
